lines.gurmukhi: bMidswl ko BUp qb; inju suq dXo pTwie ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The Raja had, then, put the son in the prison.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਤਦ ਰਾਜੇ ਨੇ ਆਪਣੇ ਪੁੱਤਰ ਨੂੰ ਬੰਦੀਖਾਨੇ ਵਿਚ ਭੇਜ ਦਿੱਤਾ।

lines.gurmukhi: Bor hoq Apny inkit; bhuro lIXo bulwie ]1]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: And early next morning he called him over.(1)

lines.gurmukhi: cOpeI ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Chaupaee

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਚੌਪਈ:

lines.gurmukhi: bMidswl inRp pUq pTwXo ]

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਰਾਜੇ ਨੇ ਬੰਦੀਖਾਨੇ ਵਿਚ (ਆਪਣੇ) ਪੁੱਤਰ ਨੂੰ ਭੇਜ ਦਿੱਤਾ।

lines.gurmukhi: BeI Bor iPir pkr mMgwXo ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The Raja sent his son to the prison and early next morning called him  back.

lines.gurmukhi: mMqRI pRBu so bcn aucwry ]

lines.gurmukhi: jwnuk sok dUir kir fwry ]2]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The Minister conversed with the Raja so as to eliminate-his afflictions.(2)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਮਾਨੋ (ਉਸ ਦੇ) ਗ਼ਮ ਨੂੰ ਦੂਰ ਕਰ ਦਿੱਤਾ ਹੋਵੇ ॥੨॥
